snippet.title: Combo Card Clashers - Dev Log #3: Druid Hero Showcase!!! | PC
snippet.description:
Hi everyone!
I am showcasing the new Druid hero. She is a hero that relies on her powerful bear ally, and the wisdom attribute! This hero is more complex compared to the other heroes and requires a lot of strategy. Look forward to playing her with the full release. Wishlist the main game below, or play the free prologue. (links provided below) Thanks for watching!

Wishlist the Main Game:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2054770/Combo_Card_Clashers/

Play the Free Prologue!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2668680/Combo_Card_Clashers_Prologue/
